config.glimchat.title: Glimesh Chat Bridge
config.glimchat.cosmetics.prefix.tooltip: Put this at the start of your messages to send them to a Glimesh channel
config.glimchat.cosmetics.dateFormat.too: Customize the timestamp format messages are going to follow
config.glimchat.cosmetics.ignorelist.too: Messages from users in this list won't be displayed
config.glimchat.cosmetics.glimeshWatchSu: Autocomplete /glimesh watch channel names with names from users in your server
text.glimchat.command.base.noargs1: Welcome to the Minecraft-Glimesh Bridge mod!
text.glimchat.command.base.noargs2: To enable it just do /glimesh enable when you're done setting up the config.
text.glimchat.command.enable.set_config: Before doing that you have to set your config!
text.glimchat.command.enable.select_chan: You won't connect to a channel because you haven't selected any. You can select a channel with /glimesh watch [channel]
text.glimchat.command.watch.connect_on_e: The mod will connect to '%s' as soon as you enable it.
text.glimchat.chat.integration_disabled: Glimesh integration is not enabled, to enable it do /glimesh enable.
text.glimchat.bot.kicked: Kicked from the current channel because: '%s'
